text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Alright, everybody. Let's begin with taking up the brush and drawing a character, since it seems you've all practiced plenty already.
Hah, saw right through us, didja? Fine by me, though. I'll show ya the fruits of my labor!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Wowzers…! Your calligraphy's so rad, Ace! Every line is so clean, I can hardly believe it's your first time doing this!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: What can I say? We still gotta lot of details to iron out, though. Like what to do for the performance, and how we're gonna arrange it all.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: …Hm? What's up, C.B…? You're makin' a weird face.
…I just feel like it's kind of stiff, y'know?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Writing it didn't feel good… Sure, I wrote the characters alright, but it just didn't click.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Hehe, here we go.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Hey, I know we said we were gonna arrange it all together, but can I modify my part a little more?
text_block_list.name: Mister C.B.

text_block_list.text: While commanding the giant brush with all our strength, we inscribe our hopes and wishes for the new year. That is the basis of the performance we're holding now…
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But to be frank, what we're aiming for this year 
around is similar to what you're saying, C.B…
Hmm? And just what might that be, Rudolf?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: For this calligraphy performance, we want to ring in the new year by entertaining everybody and lifting their spirits.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: To move their hearts with a heretofore unseen performance… That is precisely why we have gathered here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Let's make even the unthinkable into reality. 
That's quite like us, no?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: So what you're saying is that we're just gettin' started. The five of us together can make this even better, yeah?
We shouldn't constrain ourselves to a frame. It's more our style to change our performance how we see fit. Right, Rudolf?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
So, once again, what say you all? 
Will you help me make this vision into a reality together?
Hah, I didn't think for a second we were gonna do things the regular way with all of us. Alright, you're on!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Most definitely…! I can't wait to see what we make.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
You have my thanks. Then there's no time to waste— 
let us get started on our performance!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now that we've decided on the overall composition, we'll do individual practice before the performance itself. Everyone, polish up your own parts!
Y'know, I noticed a while back, but your handwriting is pretty good, Ace. Did you take classes?
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yeah, one of the old guys 'round my neighborhood taught me a little… Huh? Why aren't you practicing? Where's your paper?!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I used it all up already! It got pretty 
fun once I was happy with my part.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
No way, you used ALL that paper already?! 
Dammit, not gonna let you outdo me!
Huff… Haaah—!… My strokes are coming out messier than I expected. Using giant brushes like these is no easy task…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But wow, your handwriting is totes amazing! 
It gives off such a prim and proper vibe!
Thank you, Maruzen-san… But I still must work on balancing my dexterity with the strength I put into my writing.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Hah… hah… I gotta make my brush move more freely! Aight, one more— let's do this!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: M-me too!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Grah! There we go! And… heave-ho!
Gh… hah… Hiyah!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hehe.
Finally got all that ink off'a me… gaah, practice was so killer…! I had to use all my brains and brawns!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Ahaha! That's 'cause you put all you've got into it when you write. It'd be weird if you weren't tired.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hehe… still, that's what I gotta do.
"If you wish to see the view on the other side of the wall, then bang on it. Keep having faith."
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: That's the part you're writing, isn't it? When we were deciding on which parts we wanted to do, you claimed that one right away.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Yup. It's the first calligraphy of the year, ain't it? That means I've gotta declare my resolutions too.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: So, I'm gonna say something here and now. I wanna become so cool that the people in the audience think "I wanna do that, too!"
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: No matter how tough it gets right now— I'll do it. I'm the Renegade Ace! I'll defy the odds as many times as it takes!
So don't hold back, C.B.! If you wanna up the level of the show, then go ahead and up it!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I'll sink my teeth into the real you! I won't let go no matter how far you run!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! …I knew it. You're so fun, Ace.
…by the way, you've got some ink on you. By your neck.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: Geh, I missed a spot…?! Oi, you've got some on your back too! I thought it was a mole, but that's totally ink!
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: …hehe, oh well! Just goes to show how hard we went at it, huh!
Alright. This should meet their level of quality.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
There's practice again tomorrow with the others… 
I have to do even better than I did today!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
